id_table_3.caption: Experiment results of different methods. ↑↑\uparrow means the larger scores indicate a better performance. We highlight the best result in bold and underline the second best. * indicates that 2D-TPE significantly outperforms the baseline (p<0.05𝑝0.05p<0.05 with Sign Test). “EntLink”, “RelExtra,” and “ColType” refer to the entity linking, relation extraction, and column type annotation subsets in the TURL dataset, respectively.
